fullProfile.headline: Strategic Sales Enablement Leader | Driving Revenue Growth and Organizational Excellence
fullProfile.summary: As a dynamic and results-driven sales enablement leader, I bring a proven track record of spearheading strategic initiatives that drive revenue growth and propel organizational success. With a keen understanding of market dynamics and customer needs, I excel in developing and implementing comprehensive sales enablement programs that empower teams to surpass targets and forge enduring client relationships. My approach is characterized by strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset, enabling me to deliver impactful training, tools, and resources that optimize sales performance and yield exceptional returns on investment. I am deeply passionate about fostering a culture of continuous improvement and driving organizational excellence. By aligning cross-functional teams and leveraging synergies, I consistently achieve business objectives with precision and agility. Having honed my expertise in sales enablement leadership, I am eager to bring my strategic acumen and drive for results to your team, contributing to sustained growth and prosperity. Let's connect and explore how we can work together to achieve remarkable success in the dynamic world of sales enablement.

recommendations.recommendation:
“Liz is a fantastic person to work with. She is a hard working, self-starter. Liz has excellent stakeholder management skills; I have seen her lead a group of executives with diverse ideas to creating a cohesive and action oriented plan. Liz has demonstrated the ability to run and deliver complex projects, such as the rollout of a new sales methodology across the whole organization, with clarity and vision - she has the ability to drive transformational change.

As a manager, she has strong talent development skills; she actively seeks opportunities for her team to stretch themselves so they can grow and develop. She is also a wonderful coach, helping guide her reports to the best solution through active listening and questioning.”

“I genuinely look forward to our weekly 1-1, as I always learn something talking to Liz. 

With her finger on the company's pulse and a proper understanding of the needs of the sales process, she has been that catalyst for so many creative assets and sales-driven content that I've lost count. Liz has inspired so much of my output over the last 12 months; we should probably be sharing the byline. Her drive and diligence are inspiring, and her insight is invaluable. 

Liz is one of those people for whom going above and beyond is her natural state, and her industry experience and process-driven methodology are the backbone of our content calendar and prolific output. Friendly, open, and honest. Consistently motivated, professional, inspiring, and knowledgeable. I hope to continue to work with Liz and to support the sales process under her irreplaceable direction for many years to come.”

Open and productive conversation was always the norm and we had success across our team under her management. She has mastered multiple roles and I'm sure can rise to any challenge given.”

“Working under Lindsey for five years was an invaluable chapter in my professional journey. From day one, Lindsey distinguished herself not only as a visionary leader but also as an exceptional mentor. Her deep industry knowledge, coupled with an innate ability to guide and inspire, has profoundly shaped my career.

Lindsey possesses a rare blend of strategic foresight and operational expertise, making her a driving force behind our team's success. Under her leadership, we consistently exceeded our targets, setting new benchmarks for excellence within the company. Her commitment to innovation and quality has left a lasting impression on me.

Beyond her professional achievements, what stands out most is Lindsey's dedication to developing her team. She invested significant time in imparting crucial leadership skills and fostering a culture of continuous improvement. Her approachable and supportive nature encouraged open communication and collaboration, which not only enhanced our team's performance but also my personal growth.

Lindsey's impact on my career cannot be overstated. Her mentorship has been a guiding light, equipping me with the tools and confidence to tackle new challenges and pursue excellence. She is truly an asset to any organization, and I am profoundly grateful for the opportunity to have worked alongside such an inspiring leader.”

publications.description: Im Zeitalter von IoT, Big Data, Cloud, Mobile und Social Media sehen sich Unternehmen wachsenden Herausforderungen gestellt – eine Vielzahl von neuen Technologien führt zu immer neuen Datensilos, das Heben von Datenschätzen wird zunehmend schwerer; die Spirale aus Kosten, Zeit und Ressourcen dreht sich immer schneller. Datenvirtualisierung bietet im Gegensatz zu traditionellen Ansätzen, wie ETL oder EAI, eine schnelle Integration von internen und externen Daten; deren Bereitstellung erfolgt in variablen Formaten, passend für alle Applikationen im Unternehmen. fullProfile.headline: Strategic Sales Enablement Leader | Driving Revenue Growth and Organizational Excellence
fullProfile.summary: As a dynamic and results-driven sales enablement leader, I bring a proven track record of spearheading strategic initiatives that drive revenue growth and propel organizational success. With a keen understanding of market dynamics and customer needs, I excel in developing and implementing comprehensive sales enablement programs that empower teams to surpass targets and forge enduring client relationships. My approach is characterized by strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset, enabling me to deliver impactful training, tools, and resources that optimize sales performance and yield exceptional returns on investment. I am deeply passionate about fostering a culture of continuous improvement and driving organizational excellence. By aligning cross-functional teams and leveraging synergies, I consistently achieve business objectives with precision and agility. Having honed my expertise in sales enablement leadership, I am eager to bring my strategic acumen and drive for results to your team, contributing to sustained growth and prosperity. Let's connect and explore how we can work together to achieve remarkable success in the dynamic world of sales enablement.

recommendations.recommendation:
“Liz is a fantastic person to work with. She is a hard working, self-starter. Liz has excellent stakeholder management skills; I have seen her lead a group of executives with diverse ideas to creating a cohesive and action oriented plan. Liz has demonstrated the ability to run and deliver complex projects, such as the rollout of a new sales methodology across the whole organization, with clarity and vision - she has the ability to drive transformational change.

As a manager, she has strong talent development skills; she actively seeks opportunities for her team to stretch themselves so they can grow and develop. She is also a wonderful coach, helping guide her reports to the best solution through active listening and questioning.”

“I genuinely look forward to our weekly 1-1, as I always learn something talking to Liz. 

With her finger on the company's pulse and a proper understanding of the needs of the sales process, she has been that catalyst for so many creative assets and sales-driven content that I've lost count. Liz has inspired so much of my output over the last 12 months; we should probably be sharing the byline. Her drive and diligence are inspiring, and her insight is invaluable. 

Liz is one of those people for whom going above and beyond is her natural state, and her industry experience and process-driven methodology are the backbone of our content calendar and prolific output. Friendly, open, and honest. Consistently motivated, professional, inspiring, and knowledgeable. I hope to continue to work with Liz and to support the sales process under her irreplaceable direction for many years to come.”

Open and productive conversation was always the norm and we had success across our team under her management. She has mastered multiple roles and I'm sure can rise to any challenge given.”

“Working under Lindsey for five years was an invaluable chapter in my professional journey. From day one, Lindsey distinguished herself not only as a visionary leader but also as an exceptional mentor. Her deep industry knowledge, coupled with an innate ability to guide and inspire, has profoundly shaped my career.

Lindsey possesses a rare blend of strategic foresight and operational expertise, making her a driving force behind our team's success. Under her leadership, we consistently exceeded our targets, setting new benchmarks for excellence within the company. Her commitment to innovation and quality has left a lasting impression on me.

Beyond her professional achievements, what stands out most is Lindsey's dedication to developing her team. She invested significant time in imparting crucial leadership skills and fostering a culture of continuous improvement. Her approachable and supportive nature encouraged open communication and collaboration, which not only enhanced our team's performance but also my personal growth.

Lindsey's impact on my career cannot be overstated. Her mentorship has been a guiding light, equipping me with the tools and confidence to tackle new challenges and pursue excellence. publications.title: Datenvirtualisierung: Mit Real-Time Information Services zu Pervasive BI
publications.description: Im Zeitalter von IoT, Big Data, Cloud, Mobile und Social Media sehen sich Unternehmen wachsenden Herausforderungen gestellt – eine Vielzahl von neuen Technologien führt zu immer neuen Datensilos, das Heben von Datenschätzen wird zunehmend schwerer; die Spirale aus Kosten, Zeit und Ressourcen dreht sich immer schneller. Datenvirtualisierung bietet im Gegensatz zu traditionellen Ansätzen, wie ETL oder EAI, eine schnelle Integration von internen und externen Daten; deren Bereitstellung erfolgt in variablen Formaten, passend für alle Applikationen im Unternehmen. Show less
